subject: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
DEED OF AGREEMENT

This deed of Agreement made today the      date……………………… between Dr. Tenko
Mohammed the payment general of the federation of Nigeria with office at
No.M111 Diplomatic  Drive Garki/ Abuja  Mr./Mrs. of COUNTRY………………………with
address …………………………..............……….. State’s thus.
    That we have both agreed on the terms and condition of service as
proposed.
Dr. Tenko Mohammed will procure all the necessary transfer release
documents associated with my paymentUSD 10.5 Million  without my
involvement financially and also safeguard all the payment transfer
release   documents until payment is confirmed in my bank account or by ATM
payment mode
That we have both agreed that 20 percent of the total amount be paid to Dr.
Tenko Mohammed upon confirmation of transfer.
That all charges and fees relating to the transaction with the government
of Nigeria payable to the bank and the ministry of finance will be deducted
from the principal amount except fees or charges payable to the federal
high court of Nigeria if any which shall be taken care of by me  the
beneficiary.

……………………….         …….. …………….
 Sign/Beneficiary                                 Sign/PayMaster General

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this deed of agreement. It's quite interesting to read about the terms and conditions proposed between Dr. Tenko Mohammed and Mr./Mrs. of COUNTRY.

I'm curious, could you please elaborate more on the role of Dr. Tenko Mohammed in this agreement? And what exactly does the "necessary transfer release documents" refer to?

Also, I noticed that some parts of your message seem incomplete or unclear, such as "my Million without my" and "percent of the total ount be paid to Dr.". Could you kindly clarify these points?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
Good questions.   My rule as the paymaster general will be to procure all
the payment release documents and make sure they authenticated and
registered with with the federal high court here in Abuja , that you will
give me 20 percent of the total amount which is USD 10.5 Million upon
confirmation of payment in your account

 I, Dr Tanko Mohammed, will  use my position and make sure that all charges
payable to the bank and the federal ministry of finance will be deducted
from the principal amount ( USD 10.5  Million ) except charges that are
payable to the federal high court which will be paid to them by the
beneficiary .

I want you to send your details as quickly as you can as we have wasted
some valuable time because of my inability to respond to your eiliar
message to me regarding the subject .

I would not like them to revoke and or return the already approved payment
to the government treasury as unclaimed funds because of delay .

Dr Tanko

Direct Phone : 234811-2810411 ( Whatsapp )

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
Hello Dr. Tanko Mohammed,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to hear about your role as the paymaster general and the procedures involved in procuring payment release documents.

I'm curious, how does the registration process with the federal high court in Abuja work? And why is it necessary to deduct charges from the principal amount?

Also, could you please elaborate on what happens if there is a delay and the approved payment gets returned to the government treasury as unclaimed funds? 

Looking forward to hearing more about this process.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
When the documents are procured on your name as the beneficiary of the
funds , It will be taken  to the federal high court for authentication and
also they will issue the certificate of fund ownership after swearing an
affidavit .

After that , there will be no hitch or delay in effecting the release of
the payment into the beneficiaries account within 24 working hours as
stipulated .

Tanko

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
Hello Tanko,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like a very thorough process. Could you please explain to me what the 'of fund ownership' is? And how does swearing an affidavit work in this context? I'm not very familiar with these legal terms.

Also, could you tell me more about the federal high court's role in this process? What exactly do they do?

I appreciate your patience and look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
So sorry , the fund has been reallocated  to another beneficiary .
Tanko

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
Hello Tanko,

Oh, that's quite surprising! I was really looking forward to learning more about this fund. Could you please tell me more about how it works and what happened? Is there any other opportunity like this one that I could possibly be a part of?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
Send your details to me  , I mean your office or home address with your
direct telephone number to enable me start work by writing an application
for the release of your entitlement to you. When the application is granted
, I will notify you on what to do .

Tanko

subject: Re: PLEASE THIS MESSAGE IS TIME SENSITIVE
body:
Hello Tanko,

Thank you for your message. I'm really interested in what you're saying, but could you please clarify a few things for me? What exactly is the work that needs to be started? And what will be released to me?

I'm sorry, but I can't provide my address or phone number. Is there another way we can continue this conversation? Maybe through email or here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
John
